powerfulManagement: Manage bookings, users, and content easily.

pageNotFoundMessage: Oops! The page you are looking for does not exist. It might have been moved or deleted.

errorSearchingBookings: An error occurred while searching for bookings.
pleaseEnterPhoneNumber: Please enter a phone number to search.
enterCredentialsToAccessAccount: Enter your credentials to access your account.
invalidEmailFormat: Invalid email format. Please check and try again.
companyRegistrationDescription: Register your company to book our facilities.
registrationSubmittedMessage: Your company registration has been submitted and is pending approval. You will be notified via email once reviewed.
emailAlreadyInUseError: This email address is already in use. Please try another one or login.
unknownError: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
logoutSuccessfulMessage: You have been successfully logged out.
logoutFailedMessage: An error occurred during logout. Please try again.
duplicateBookingForPhoneOnDateError: Sorry, you cannot book twice with the same phone number for the same start date.
errorCheckingExistingBookings: Error checking for existing bookings. Please try again.
dateRangeRequired: Date range with start and end dates is required.
invalidDateRange: End date cannot be before start date.
couldNotCalculatePrice: Could not calculate booking price. Item details missing.
errorSavingBooking: An error occurred while saving your booking. Please try again.

noBookingsMatchFilters: No bookings match your current filters.
noBookingsFoundAdminCta: No bookings found yet. Bookings from users will appear here.
confirmDeleteBookingMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this booking? This action cannot be undone.
phoneForTelegramIdentification: This phone number will be used for Telegram payment proof identification.
phoneForTelegramIdentificationOptional: This phone number can be used for Telegram payment proof identification (optional).
completeYourPaymentDescription: Please follow the instructions below to complete your payment via bank transfer.
paymentReferenceNote: Important: Use your Booking ID ({bookingId}) as the payment reference/reason.
telegramProofSubmissionInstruction: After making the transfer, please send a screenshot or photo of your payment proof to our Telegram Bot: {botUsername}. Mention your phone number ({phoneNumber}) in the message for quick verification.
afterSendingProofAdminWillVerify: After sending proof, our team will verify your payment and update your booking status.
missingBookingId: Booking ID is missing from the request.
paymentNotExpectedOrAlreadyProcessed: Payment is not expected for this booking at its current stage, or it has already been processed.
paymentAwaitingTelegramVerificationDesc: Thank you! We've noted that you'll be sending payment proof via Telegram. Please send it soon for verification.
thankYouFacilityBookingWillBeReviewed: Thank you for your request. We will review your facility booking and contact you shortly with confirmation and payment details if approved.
incompleteBookingConfirmationDetails: Booking confirmation details are incomplete. Please try booking again or contact support.
errorCheckingAvailability: Error checking availability. Please try again or contact support.
itemUnavailableConflict: {itemName} is not available for the selected dates due to a conflicting booking.
dormitoryBedsUnavailable: {roomName} does not have enough available beds for the selected dates.
dormitoryCapacityNotConfigured: Dormitory capacity is not properly configured. Please contact support.

registrationRejectedMessage: We regret to inform you that your company registration has not been approved at this time.
contactSupportForAssistance: Please contact support if you believe this is an error or for further assistance.

bankDetailsForPaymentVerification: Use these details for bank transfers and payment verification.

noFacilityBookingsMatchFilters: No facility bookings match your current filters.
viewAndManageFacilityBookings: View and manage all facility bookings.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyToViewAgreement: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to view this agreement.
accessDeniedViewAgreement: You do not have permission to view this agreement.
agreementNotReadyForViewing: This agreement is not yet available for viewing by the client.
termsPlaceholder1: 1. Payment: Full payment is due upon confirmation of this agreement unless otherwise specified. Payments can be made via bank transfer to the account detailed by OromiaEduRent.
termsPlaceholder2: 2. Cancellation: Cancellations made less than 7 days prior to the event start date are subject to a 50% cancellation fee. Cancellations made less than 48 hours prior will incur the full booking cost.
termsPlaceholder3: 3. Damages: The Client is responsible for any damages to the facility or equipment caused by their attendees or staff during the rental period. Costs for repair or replacement will be billed to the Client.
termsPlaceholder4: 4. Conduct: The Client agrees to ensure all attendees conduct themselves in an orderly manner and comply with all facility regulations. OromiaEduRent reserves the right to remove any individual or terminate the event if conduct is deemed disruptive or unsafe.
thankYouForBusiness: Thank you for choosing OromiaEduRent. We look forward to hosting your event.
agreementNotApplicable: Agreement is not applicable for this type of booking.
enterCustomTermsHere: Enter custom terms and conditions here. These will override the default terms if provided.
editTermsNote: Note: These terms will be displayed on the printable agreement. Clear this field to use default terms.
agreementNotAvailableForBooking: Agreement generation is not applicable or ready for this booking's current status (e.g., not facility, not approved).
userDataMissing: Login successful, but key profile data is missing. Please contact support.
pageNoLongerInUseMessage: This page for submitting payment proof is no longer in use. Please follow the instructions provided on the payment details page to submit proof via Telegram.
firestorePermissionError: A database permission error occurred. Please contact support.
firestoreIndexRequiredErrorDetailed: The database requires a specific index for this operation which is currently missing. Please inform the site administrator. If you are the administrator, check the browser console for a link to create the required Firestore index.
duplicateCheckSkippedBookingProceeds: Duplicate booking check was skipped due to a database configuration issue. Your booking will be submitted, but duplicates might occur. Admin will review. Please create the required Firestore index.
